title: MAKING ANY TYPE OF COMMENT USING MEDICAL ILLNESSES TO IMPLEMENT AND DESCRIBE POOR GAME PLAY
body: I am soooooooooooooooo tired of having disrespectful and ignorant players using **"AUTISM  & MENTAL RETARDATION"** to describe poor game play. I feel as though if you are caught using these phrases you deserve to be **severely punished** and after extensive use have your account **TERMINATED!** This is cyber bullying!! Riot i ask you to put on the big boy pants and stop letting ignorance spread. I know you guys cant control everything people say but, this type of behavior is unexceptionable.

replies.body: Stuff like that shows up in chat logs around here all the time. I assure you that people are punished for them. Just report and move on.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/PxFFoEvo-banned-4-one-game-xd
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/JuQn5huw-best-taric-perma-ban-offensive-chat
